introduction.title: Hey!
introduction.description: My name is Jokubas Serapinas. I am a Medialogy Bachelor student at Aalborg University Copenhagen and a Student Android Developer at Shape Games ApS. Thank you for coming to my page!

timeline_items.title: Started studies at the Aalborg University Copenhagen
timeline_items.description: I started Medialogy bachelor studies as an international student at Aalborg University Copenhagen.

timeline_items.title: First steps in Android development
timeline_items.description: At first in one of the Medialogy 2nd semester courses, but later individually I started investigating native Android development. Throughout the upcoming year I developed several smaller apps including the Mobile Movie Database (MMDb), which you can look up in the Portfolio section.

timeline_items.title: Part-time job as a Student Android Developer
timeline_items.description: I started my career as an Android developer at Shape Games ApS. Here I worked part-time (2-3 days a week), while also combining it with my ongoing bachelor studies.
